text:
Every hour or so on my Linux webserver which I compiled Apache for, if there has
been more than 30 minutes of inactivity, Apache stops listening on port 80.
I think it is more to do with Kubuntu (KDE Ubuntu Linux) than Apache but I
thought I had better post it here in case that it was an Apache bug.  At the
moment, I am just connecting downloading a blank page and disconnecting every
minute through a program I have written but it does not solve problems in the
long run.

I shall not post the workaround here yet because I am not certain if it is an
Apache or Linux bug.
creator: apache@cjmweb.fsnet.co.uk

text:
"stops listening" is a little vague:

- does httpd exit?
- what is logged to the error_log?

This sounds like some system network configuration issue; I suggest you try an
Ubuntu list or users@httpd.apache.org for further help.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
